TopicTitle: 0.21 with no MechJeb? No sweat, I got this.

Articles.Content:
Whew 0.21 is pretty nice.

But MJ doesn't seem to work well with it. Oh well, I'll just head to the Mun without it.

What could go wrong with this plan?

Hmm... Might be close.

Bob looks concerned. I got this, I got this.

Hey I landed.. sorta. We saw, we came, we'll probably stay.

Need more fuel and more practice on landing. started my burn way to soon.
There's a section for this, Mission Reports. I would put this there rather than here.
MechJeb's been updated, by the way. About 15 minutes ago.

and then you left them there

what a jerk...

all you needed was ~700m/s dV and a chute to bring them back and you didnt even bother?

nah... it's ok... you'll just have to fly another ship to save them or you can kill them

and then you left them there

what a jerk...

all you needed was ~700m/s dV and a chute to bring them back and you didnt even bother?

nah... it's ok... you'll just have to fly another ship to save them or you can kill them

Yup they are there, waiting for a rescue that is sure to come. My choices were:

Use the quick save I had taken just before the first screen shot and then try to return.

Revert back to launch and try again.

Or, as I'm planning to do, make a rescue mission (with new trainees. Oh joy!).

I got them into that pickle, I'll get them out. I never leave a Kerbal behind. I may kill them trying to rescue them but I always make the attempt.

Benie, I may go get the updated MJ, but not just yet. My manual skills need a lot of work it seems.
